items.sentence: It wouldn\'t be all that difficult for us to do what Tom wants us to do.
Yesterday, when Tom was backing up his car, he ran over Mary\'s bicycle.
After I got married, my Japanese got better and I could understand more.
As soon as I can get the chance, I\'ll help your mother paint the fence.
Though I\'ve decided to go to the party, I\'m not looking forward to it.
